product_name: Giro Rumble Mountain Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The versatile Giro Rumble mountain bike shoes combine the walkability of light hiking shoes with high-performance MTB shoe details, providing equal comfort on and off your bike. Premium, durable synthetic leather uppers are built to take whatever the mountain can dish out. Injected internal shanks provide good pedaling stiffness and flex for comfort while walking. Non-slip laces allow you to personalize the fit, hidden lace holders keep them from getting in the way. Molded EVA footbeds with medium arch support discourage arch fatigue and enhance comfort. Lugged outsoles offer traction on trails even when you're off the bike. SPD, Time and Crank Brothers cleat compatible. Giro Rumble mountain bike shoes do not include cleats, (pedals typically include cleats; cleats are also available for separate purchase).
short_description: The versatile Giro Rumble mountain bike shoes combine the walkability of light hiking shoes with high-performance MTB shoe details, providing equal comfort on and off your bike.
